short_summary: combing and trucking sevices for agricultural purposes
description: the correctional service of canada (csc), CORCAN, Collins Bay and Joyceville Institutions, Kingston, Ontario requires combining and grain trucking services for cropping operations \\[objectives: provide combining and trucking services for wheat, soybean, corn and barley crops\[deliverables: provide combining and trucking services for the following crops: wheat, soybean, corn and barley\[nature of requirement: the contractor will provide all equipment and manpower necessary for the combing of the crops listed above\[
